user_query: I am organizing a company retreat and need to verify the email addresses of the team members to ensure they are valid using the Disposable Email Validation API. Additionally, I want to retrieve the user orders from the Demo Project API to track registrations. Can you also provide me with information about the logged-in user using the Me API from the Demo Project?

TaskList.description: Gather team members' email addresses that need to be verified.
Verify the email addresses using the Disposable Email Validation API.
Retrieve user orders from the Demo Project API to track registrations.
Fetch information about the logged-in user using the Me API from the Demo Project.
